original_text: After she had given him a drink, she said, “I’ll draw water for your camels too, until they have had enough to drink.”
korean_text: 마시게 하기를 다하고 이르되 당신의 낙타를 위하여서도 물을 길어 그것들도 배불리 마시게 하리이다 하고

sentences.original_text: After she had given him a drink,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그에게 마실 것을 준 후에,

sentences.original_text: I'll draw water for your camels too,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신의 낙타들을 위해서도 물을 길어 올 것이요,

sentences.original_text: until they have had enough to drink.
